description:
Please read all of the below before responding.
Respond with full CV out lining that you cover ALL of the required skills. You must have activeliy worked with the required skills to be shortlisted. Anyone not fullfilling ALL required skills and at least one prefereed skill will be disregarded.
An email saying you are interested or you are good for the job will be disregarded.

Only full CVs and a short letter on how you fullfill what is asked for by my client.

We are now looking for a Python Backend Developer on the behalf of our client.


Job Description:
We are looking for an experienced Python Backend Developer with a robust understanding of Azure cloud services, microservices architecture and automation. ShotGrid Autodesk integration will be considered a strong advantage. The ideal candidate will be possess experience with CI/CD deployments and Azure DevOps for project management. Familiarity with the ShotGrid platform and its integration into backend services will be regarded as a strong asset. We’re looking for a high-energy developer with a positive attitude to join our dynamic and active team.


Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient backend services using Python.Utilize Azure cloud services to deploy, manage, and scale applications, ensuring consistent performance across different environments.Implement microservices architecture to enable modular and maintainable systems.Utilize Docker to create, deploy, and manage containerized applications, ensuring consistency and reliability.Implement CI/CD pipelines for automated build, test, and deployment processes, contributing to improved development efficiency and product quality.Integrate ShotGrid Autodesk into backend workflows to enhance project tracking and collaboration.Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers, pipeline developers, DevOps engineers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality solutions on time.


Required Skills:
Extensive knowledge and hands-on experience with Python and backend development frameworks.Familiarity with Azure cloud services, including Azure Functions, CosmosDB, and Azure Service Bus.Comprehensive understanding of microservices architecture and principles.Familiarity with CI/CD tools and processes, such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or similar platforms.


Preferred Skills:
Experience with ShotGrid Autodesk and its integration into backend systems.A strong passion for automation and process improvement.Proficiency in Docker containers, including creating, deploying, and managing containerized applications using Docker CLI and Docker Compose.


Education and Experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related.4+ years of professional experience in frontend development.
